holographic.name: Holographic Will (Vlastnoručný závet)
holographic.description: Must be entirely written and signed by your own hand
requirements: Must be written entirely in your own handwriting
Must be signed with your own signature
Date is recommended but not mandatory
Must be in Slovak language or translated

witnessed.name: Witnessed Will (Závet pred svedkami)
witnessed.description: Can be typed or written by another person, requires two witnesses
requirements: Must be signed by testator in presence of two witnesses
Witnesses must be present at the same time
Witnesses must be legally capable adults
Witnesses cannot be beneficiaries or their relatives

forcedHeirs.description: Slovak law protects certain family members with mandatory inheritance shares

children.description: Children are entitled to half of their normal inheritance share

spouse.description: Spouse is entitled to quarter of the estate if there are children

parents.description: Parents are entitled if there are no children or spouse

methods: Creating a new will that explicitly revokes previous ones
Physical destruction of the will with intent to revoke
